page.title: 13HAZARDS!! CANNICH AREA
page.content:
The{farming}community has to deal with many and varied hazards and dangers to their{livestock.
Extensive areas of bracken (uneconomic to eradicate) harbour ticks in very large numbers. Associated{diseases}in farm{animals,}particularly in sheep and cattle, are lethal and expensive veterinary preventative measures go nowhere near coping with the problem. Red deer are also important hosts in the life cycle of the tick.
Pneumonia is a common ailment, par- ticularly in sheep, and often fatal despite routine preventative inoculations. Veterinary experts claim that the tick infestations render the pneumonia vaccines less effective.
